question.qText: "Soviet Premier Nikita Khrushchev’s decision to pull Soviet nuclear missiles out of Cuba was justified."

aBtn.aText: A contemporary Russian newspaper article criticizing Khrushchev’s decision.
A U.S.-Soviet agreement guaranteeing the U.S. would never invade Cuba.
A summary of Russia’s military spending throughout the 1950s and 1960s.
A quotation from a Soviet soldier stationed in Cuba during the Cuban Missile Crisis.
The dates of Cold War confrontations between 1946 and 1962.
